bio: I'm currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering at Starex University, with a strong interest in Software Engineering, Full-Stack Development, Web Technologies, and AI/ML applications. Over the past few years, I have developed a solid foundation in problem-solving, writing algorithms, and scalable web applications using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Java to create real-world projects that add value.

about.description:
I'm currently pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science Engineering at Starex University, with a strong interest in Software Engineering, Full-Stack Development, Web Technologies, and AI/ML applications.

Over the past few years, I have developed a solid foundation in problem-solving, writing algorithms, and scalable web applications using modern technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and Java to create real-world projects that add value.

What defines me:
• Passion for software engineering & full-stack development
• Interest in AI-driven solutions and innovative tech projects
• Strong problem-solving & analytical skills
• Ability to learn fast, adapt, and collaborate effectively

Currently looking for: Internships / Full-time roles in Software Development, Web Development, and AI/ML

Opportunities to work with startups, co-founders, and tech partners

Projects where I can combine coding, creativity, and innovation to create value.

I strongly believe in "Every connection is an opportunity to learn, share, and grow together."

Always open to connecting with recruiters, founders, and tech enthusiasts who are building the future of technology.
highlights: B.Tech CSE Student at Starex University
Full-Stack Developer (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB)
Campus Ambassador & Marketing Intern at Corizo
Project Intern at Network Traffic Anomaly Detection
